name: Strike a Light
description:
This short poem is part of my research into game-poem hybrids. The term 'ludokinetic poem' here means a poem that incorporates the player cybernetically into its world and implicates them in its events.

I challenged myself to make this in one weekend and finish it before bonfire night, but I had some serious hiccups with Game Maker's HTML5 export module, so it's going up a day late.
